challenge.title: Michelle Alexander - The New Jim Crow - Mass Incarceration in the Age of Colorblindness
challenge.description: Michelle Alexander's The New Jim Crow - Mass Incarceration in the Age of Colorblindness is a book about the mass incarceration of black men and their resulting systemic oppression as a convicted felon from the racist social policy known as the War on Drugs.
challenge.instructions: Read Michelle Alexander's The New Jim Crow - Mass Incarceration in the Age of Colorblindness on Archive.org.
